text: The 2002 MLB Japan All-Star Series was the eighth edition of the championship, a best-of-eight series between the All-Star teams from Major League Baseball (MLB) and Nippon Professional Baseball (NPB). MLB won the series by 5–3–0 and Torii Hunter was named MVP. == Results == Championship {| class="wikitable" |- ! Game !! Winning Team !! Score !! Losing Team !!
